storyInfo: The Viscount asks Weiss to pass Enciodes a message, inviting him and the Saintess to a banquet. The drunken pair of Leto and Arctosz wreak havoc, as if father and daughter.

attributes.content: Sir, it's me.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Viscount Harold tasked me with delivering this letter to you.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The Viscount?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It seems like he really was quite aware of you shadowing him to his barracks on my orders.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The blame is mine for getting found out. Will this affect anything, Sir?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It will not. You may continue.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: How did he find you?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, Sir!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: That afternoon...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It is currently five in the afternoon. Now recording today's situation.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Things today are not much different from past recordings.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The infected barracks' soldiers regularly perform drills in the mountains nearby.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Well, I say drills, but it's mostly them trying to stave off boredom.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The uninfected soldiers, on the other hand, have more freedom of movement.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Thanks to this, they get up to all sorts of things. It's a bit of a pain to—Scratch that. Based on previous investigations, most of them simply drink and get rowdy at the taverns at the foot of the mountain.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: There are still four people keeping watch at the camp. Three are playing cards, while one is sleeping.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: After the one who was sleeping woke up, one of the other three left. He seemed to be quite happy as he was walking away.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: If it's to visit the Turiels, I'd say he's taken a fancy to their daughter.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: These Victorians have been here for nearly a month.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Even though I volunteered myself to scout in the first place, the more I watch them the more I wonder if there is even any point in monitoring them.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: They really do look like they're just here for sightseeing.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Ah, right.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It looked like Viscount Harold had returned to camp and started playing cards with the soldiers, but he is now nowhere to be seen...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You know, a kindhearted old man like me would call it a pity that you're out here alone on a mountain, Mr. Weiss.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Which is why I brought along a drink for you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No need to worry, old chap.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Watching us every day must be a right chore.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I get it, though. After all, there's a bunch of foreign troops stationed here. I'd be worried too. And so your Sir Enciodes can't help but have a little disdain for us Victorians.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Go on, take a sip already. It'll warm you up.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not great with alcohol.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Is that so? What a pity. I didn't have much taste for booze either, when I was younger. Felt like I could do just about anything sober.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Ah, but now I finally understand why drink enchants people so.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please tell me, Lord Viscount. What exactly will you do, now that you've found me?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I was simply hoping you could assist me in a small matter, Mr. Weiss.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Be a sport and pass this letter along to Enciodes, if you would.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright. I'll do that.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Eh? Not going to ask why?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You've already found me out. I couldn't quite hide myself from your keen eyes.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: And pointing it out to me so bluntly speaks volumes about your attitude on the matter.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I'll inform my master about that, alongside this letter.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Forgive me, Sir. If only I had trained my scouting a bit more...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: There is naught to forgive. No matter what they say, in the end they are still Victorian soldiers.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There is an objective gap between our capabilities and theirs.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It is enough that you perform your work at your own pace.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Moreover, it is as you said. That he wished to use you to convey this to me is telling about his attitude.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You have observed their barracks for nearly a month now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Tell me what you think of them, Weiss.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, Sir.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Before the Victorian Army even set foot inside Turicum, we had already prepared extensively, just in case.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But we never actually used any of our contingencies.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: They rushed in, as if tomorrow they would occupy all of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But as we braced for impact, we ended up in this situation. They mostly stay at the foot of the mountain, with minimal activity.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: That viscount...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: He deliberately set up camp far from any major towns or cities, so as to minimize disturbances to the locals.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Their barracks are split up into camps for the Infected and uninfected. They've even put up a notice to inform visitors.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: According to some intelligence I dug up, He has even ordered his men to help the locals with their daily tasks.
attributes.name: Weiss
Weiss
attributes.content: How should I put this...?

attributes.name: Weiss
attributes.content: He truly respects his men, and he also respects us Kjerags.
And so I think he's worthy of our respect too.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Otherwise, you wouldn't have asked Matterhorn to pass them medicine and supplies.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Weiss stops speaking, his report complete, but Enciodes does not respond.
The rhythmic sound of Enciodes's index finger slowly tapping at the armrest of his chair clearly echoes throughout the room, like water slowly but firmly dripping from the eaves.
This letter. What do you make of it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ultimately, they have infringed on our borders in the name of Victoria. And now, they have used me as the means to pass you this letter.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I believe this was intended as both a rap across the knuckles and a warning.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Could it be... that after all this, they can't actually contain themselves?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You've always been fond of taking the negative tack, Weiss.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Apologies, sir.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: No, this is one of your strengths.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You are correct. He deliberately sought you out, so as to reveal his strength.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But at the same time, it is unlikely he would not know that you are my attendant.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A man of his position could approach me directly and to inform me of the contents of this letter.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But he used you to pass it to me instead.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you feel like that is etiquette befitting a noble?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And... it's a very humble gesture.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: He is a strange man.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: He represents the will of a Victorian Duke, but that does not mean—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That every chess piece is a willing puppet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir, what exactly is the letter regarding?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Enciodes does not reply, merely placing the piece of paper within the envelope atop the table and sliding it towards Weiss.
It's... an invitation?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: An invitation for me, alongside our Saintess, to take part in a dinner party he's arranged.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You and Lady Enya...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Surely he doesn't...? No, it couldn't be. If he really did sense something amiss, he wouldn't go about it in such a friendly manner.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Find Matterhorn, and ask him to take one of the finest bottles from our distillery's storehouse.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ah. On second thought, Weiss.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir...?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: No need to go to the distillery. Come with me to the Silverash wine cellar. I will fetch the drink personally.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You mean, the old manor's cellar?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: There may be wine there, but...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You need only do as I ask.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He has already revealed his sincerity to us. And so, it is my turn to do the same.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What in Kjeragandr's name is going on...?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I'm telling you, we Ursus can drink way more than this any day!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Come visit sometime! It'll be my treat!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hahaha! Very well! It's a deal!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Drink! Come, drink more!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Now that's some fine wine!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Nonono, it's not wine, it's honey!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Man, Kjerag's own local highland honey... *hic* This flavor sure is something else.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's your lucky day, because I brought a few bottles of my own on the train!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah, honey! How very sobe... *hic* sobering!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This flavor is great, stupendous! I, Arctosz, do decree it so! Come, down it!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Eh? Girl, why'd you turn all wrinkly?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hahaha! Buddy, you've got the wrong guy! I'm over here!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Let go... Useless son of mine, let go I say!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Hey, kid, how come you're so strong all of a suddenly? Don't tell me you don't like my drinks?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Well that's no good! Wait here, I'll go get the best, bestest spirits!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Just you wait!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hey, buddy—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I already told you, you got the wrong guy!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You... You two...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Gulo! GULO!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I'm here, Master!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: What is the meaning of this?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Sir had drank a bit too much, and once he saw Madam Rosalind, he invited her to drink with him.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I... I wasn't able to stop them!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Arctosz, you besotted oaf!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: When he looked at Rosalind, did he—did he really not come to any realizations?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Not exactly.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Well, what then?! Spit it out already!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: When he saw Rosalind, Sir said that she looked a bit familiar.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But I think he might have been too drunk. We waited here a good while, and he didn't say another word about it. Not a peep.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: And then?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: And then Madam Rosalind thought of something to lighten the mood. She got out some honey drinks she brought with her and gave some to Sir to try...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: And then, well... Here we are.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: How did Arctosz get this far without learning how to handle honey drunkenness?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: It's his nature, I'm afraid. I don't think he could handle it, even if he tried.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: To be honest, he might have inherited it from you, Master...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (Glare)
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: What should we do now?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: What should we do? You're asking me what we should do?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Wait until Arctosz has sobered up. Once he has a clearer head, even he cannot deny the things that us two have noticed.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: When I see Rosalind, I see Arctosz when he was her age.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I remember. He didn't have his beard back then.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Pah, he was just afraid of not looking reliable enough. It's a ploy!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: If he had really been reliable back then, it would never had come to this...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Batyushka, you're finally here!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Who wasn't reliable? What back then? What're you guys talking about?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah, nothing, just some reminiscing...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Hmph, another secret you're keeping.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: All right then, keep your secrets.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Here, batyushka. This is for you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I saved you one last bottle of honey. Let's drink!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Very well.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: (Doesn't sound like there'll be any trouble from them.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (Sure looks like a family reunion or something to me.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (No, I can't rule out the possibility of them exchanging information via codewords.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: (I still need to watch them carefully.)
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: You, why are you loafing around over there?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Ah, Master. A new delivery of drink has just arrived, and I need men to help me bring it all in.
attributes.name: Guard?

attributes.content: You may go, young Gulo.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Yes, Master!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Uh, I'll go on ahead first then?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Yes, just go already. I'll make sure these two don't get up to further trouble.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I brought more drink!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait, this much?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hahaha! Did you empty the entire cellar or something, my man?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The people of Kjerag are never stingy when treating their guests!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: After gifting me your honey, it's only natural that I share something of mine. I wouldn't want a girl like you thinking I wasn't generous.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Try this one on for size!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Since you have such fine taste, I've grabbed the rarest drink in my collection. I wouldn't even bring it out for the banquet tomorrow!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: 'Snow Realm Spring'? The year's on the label too. Ooh, this looks familiar. I think I've seen this brand in the Doctor's office...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah, whatever, time to drink up!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah—!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: This stuff is great!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's got a tingle, but it sure goes down easy; refreshing, yet not pungent... Yep, very fine!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hahaha! You sound just like one of those fancy sommeliers!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: At the time, it was awful hard to get this drink.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I had to grease a few palms and hide them behind my father's back to get my hands on this batch.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Why'd you have to keep it a secret?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What, did your dad not let you drink or something?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, nothing of the sort. Us men of Kjerag have been drinking since we were in diapers, unlike those Victorians who fall over after a single drop! Hahaha!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Ah, but this... Back then, it was considered taboo, especially for us Paleroches...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But those times are long gone. Things have changed.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Pah! What use is talking about it now?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Come! Have a sip.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Woah!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: This bottle might be even better than the last. If it wasn't for the fact that we were such kindred spirits, I wouldn't give it to you, even if you beat me to death over it!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Gotta sample it nice and slow! Real *hic* slow!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Look, you got it wrong again, boss. I'm over here, that there's a pillar!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Let me give it a try... Hey, why's this sour?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sour?! How dare you!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This really is sour... But why?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It aged well at first, but you have to take into account how it was stored.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Our storage methods back then were not as sophisticated as today, and after so long...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: There would always be a batch or two that went bad.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Went bad...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'd planned to give this out at the wedding reception and ask that everyone drink their fill.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'd thought... I'd thought I might share a glass of this with her...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You're drunk, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: That's enough for now.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I'm not drunk! I'm... I'm not...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: C'mon, give me that bottle!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The girl takes the slightly sour, aged spirit from Arctosz's hand.
She turns up her head, and without the slightest bit of hesitation, raises the bottle and pours the liquid straight down her throat, taking in its varied astringent notes.
Hah—!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And that's that problem solved. It was a little off, but overall, still a pretty good drink!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If you want my expert opinion, I'd say you could really grow to love that aftertaste.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Young lady, you—! Have you gone mad?!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Quick, somebody call a doctor—!
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Nah, I'm good.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're good?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It'd long since gone bad, and you still drank it? Haven't you ever heard of food poisoning?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm fine. Really.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I've eaten rotten bread and drank foul water out of the gutter before.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Compared to that, what's this drink gonna do to me?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Out of the gutter...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Why would you even do such things, girl?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'd rather not talk about those times right now.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But anyway, what I'm trying to say is, I might not really get what the whole deal is here, but I can feel it out.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You said this drink was pretty important, right, boss?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll take that as a yes.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Something as rare as that getting spilled away just because it's gone a little off sure would be sad, don't you think?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Listen...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Oh, c'mon, don't give me that face. It could work for you if you were more handsome, but you'd have to lose the beard first.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey! Why aren't we drinking?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Whatever boozy treasures are left, serve 'em up!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Today, the three of us—we're drinking until we drop!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're sure?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm sure.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: This might be an issue.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You know, lad, you usually come full of ideas, but you're a right mute here.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Can't blame me for that one, boss.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: When a lord like you suddenly wants to throw a banquet, just freeing up the space for it took our men no small amount of effort.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: It's simply for hosting two foreign dignitaries. Although it's still a bit off for that purpose.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: *sigh* I understand.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: We've invited a chef from a local restaurant to come and cook, and thanks to us and the locals being so buddy-buddy, we've also managed to get some top-quality ingredients to go with.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: We're still stumped on drinks, though.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: These three bottles of 'Snow Realm Spring 1095' were the best we could get from hereabouts.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: This one... Mouthfeel is pleasant enough, and the aroma is suitably complex.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: However, the layering's a little bit weak, and this acridity is somewhat unbalanced.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It would be fine to offer to someone the same rank as me, but for our guests at this banquet... it's far from appropriate.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's only at times like these that your nobility shows, milord.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Well, I do have to work rather hard at it.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Enough already, we all know you're just a boozer who gave yourself the excuse that you're handling the lords and ladies.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, enough lip out of you, go back and help out or something. I'll think over everything else that's left.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Boss, we've been here a whole month, and we've seen that the Kjerags, they really love their Saintess, and this Enciodes guy too.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I know you keep saying we're just here as tourists.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: What is it you think I'm up to? If I really want to do something, I would tell you to get that ambush sorted before all this.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That's what you said, sure, but don't expect the boys to come save your hide if something comes up.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, don't be such a worrywart. It's bad luck.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If I had known sooner, I would have asked the missus to pack that rare red wine we've got in the house.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Whyever are you sighing, My Lord?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ah, Sir Enciodes...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Haha, well, you've caught me in something of a pickle. I'm the one organizing this banquet, but I can't quite find a drink fit for two illustrious guests such as you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: While worrying over that, I recalled a fine vintage in my collection back home, and it gave me a twinge of homesickness.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm afraid I don't know where exactly you are a viscount of—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: County Barre.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, County Barre is not far from Toron.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Indeed! They tend to follow the same trails, have done so for quite a while now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If that is the case, then you and I were fated to meet, Lord Viscount. I lived in Toron for a time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's right, I feel like we might have met at some banquet or the other, back in the day.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If only we had recalled this forgotten connection of ours sooner, Sir Enciodes, we wouldn't have had to be at each other's throats.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I had known that you were such an interesting man, I think we would have made fast friends, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I have met with many a noble here in Kjerag, but I believe that you might be the first to get homesick at the thought of some wine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Would it be remiss for me to assume that My Lord is a family man?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hahahah, if my daughter heard those words, she would most likely die from laughter.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: In her eyes, I'm the most worthless father across all the lands.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Relations always have a different view of things to outsiders.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're right. Every family has its own issues.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm afraid that I have no solution to your longing for County Barre, but I do have the means to make you feel at home here.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: My Lord, please accept this as a token of my master's regard.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is... 'Snow Realm Spring'... '1072'?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I had heard that other than the 'Snow Realm Spring' batch that started distilling in the 90s, there were even rarer bottles from a batch from the 70s.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You're saying this is the real deal?!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Kjerag's first distillery was established under my father's auspice, but after his passing in an unfortunate accident, its output too essentially stopped.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I revived it after the founding of Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Thanks to our outdated aging techniques, most of the stuff from the 70s is completely undrinkable these days, but a few bottles from that era still survive.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They were labelled as 1070s, and what few existed were kept in the Silverash clan cellars.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What you see before you is from that collection.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Wow... Just from that hint of fragrance coming from the mouth of that bottle, I can already tell that it'll drive Victoria's greatest sommeliers wild.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: This is a mighty fine drink.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If I drank any of this, forget about feeling at home, I'd want to stay in Kjerag for another three years.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If that is ever your desire, then of course we will welcome you with open arms.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Not scared of a Victorian soldier, Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If every Victorian soldier is as reasonable a man as you, what have I to fear?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm afraid you might have some misunderstandings about me, good sir.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Then it is natural for me to wish to clear up those misunderstandings. Come, let us sit and discuss them.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ah, well... the Saintess hasn't arrived yet, so should we really be sitting?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Great Saintess is quite occupied with various affairs at the moment. There is no need to trouble her over this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It is as he says. Were I not here, there would be nothing wrong with the two of you sitting down to a chat.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It would have to clear my approval in the end anyhow.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Is that not right, Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess, I'm honored that you have deigned to grace this banquet with your presence.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It has been quite some time since you first set foot in Kjerag, Lord Viscount.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In that time, I've heard of the goodwill that you have shown Kjerag, and I had plans myself to reach out to you for our own little chat.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Today is as good an opportunity as any other.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It has been a while, Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes... You still have not answered my question.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Saintess is correct.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's just that you are the spiritual leader of all Kjerag's people, after all.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Every day, you must hear the hopes and prayers of supplicants, and keep their faith in Kjeragandr in their hearts.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Nowadays all the nations of Terra have heard tell of Her, and one by one they set their eyes on Her. This too, is yet another matter that occupies your attention.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There is no need for you to personally attend to the mundane matters of the nation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You tell a good joke, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The reason why Kjeragandr attracts more and more attention from the outside world is in fact because we take note of our people's hopes and prayers, and that we work towards a better life for all of them.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And that being the case, it means that there is no such thing as a mundane matter of the nation.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It need only be a matter of concern to the people to be a matter of concern to me.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I am sure that you would understand this simple reasoning of mine, right, Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I understand this point. As a good friend of mine once counselled me, whether in family matters or matters of state, if you try to grasp everything at play, it will often times not go as you planned.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And as a good friend once counselled me, whether in family matters or matters of state, even if you cannot attend to everything personally, you must see things through your own eyes and do things with your own hands at least once.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do you hold family matters in your heart, Sir Enciodes, or matters of state?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What is it that you wish to see, Great Saintess? What is it that you wish to do?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ah, Great Saintess, just before you arrived, Sir Enciodes gifted me a bottle of liquor.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: 'Snow Realm Spring 1072'.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A drink so fine, its only flaw is that it will upstage the main dish.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It is my gift to you. Are you afraid that it might steal your thunder as our host?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hardly, hardly.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: While I am the host, I can't really call myself the lord of this place, can I?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I would say that the Saintess herself would be considered the star of the evening.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It seems I have overstepped my bounds.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I may, Saintess, I have a proposal.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I think we should use this bottle of 1072 as the drink for tonight's meal.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What say you, Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...In 1072, when our father placed these bottles into our cellar, he believed that Kjerag's spring was just around the corner.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But even after waiting for more than twenty years, our spring has still not yet truly arrived.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now, if this bottle were a signal for the opportunity before us, that would truly be a wonderful thing.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Eloquent as ever, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Now that matter's settled, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Take this bottle to the kitchen, if you would.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: At once, Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Is that to your satisfaction, My Lord?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well, since our two guests of honor have arrived... Let's get this banquet started.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please, have a seat.
attributes.name: Harold
